//101 * 1010 = // 5*10 = 50 // 2
//11001011 - 1010010 // 203-82 = 121 // y
//1011111000 / 1010 // 760/10 = 76 // L
//1110000 % 1110101 // 112 117 = 112 // p
//101101 + 110100 // 45+52 = 97 // a
//1010100 - 0001000 // 84 - 8 = 76 //L
//1000000 + 10 // 64 + 2 = 66 //b


// bit.ly/2yLpaLb

101 * 1010
5 * 10 = 50

11001011 - 1010010
203 - 82 = 121

1011111000 / 1010
760 / 10 = 76

1110000 % 1110101
112 % 1

101101 + 110100
45 + 52 = 97

1010100 - 100101010
1010100- 0001000
84 - 8 = 76

1000000 + 10
64 +2 =  66

http://bit.ly/2yLpaLB
